title.emphasis: Figure 4: Phylogenetic analysis of cysteine-loop ligand-gated ion channels.

formalpara.para: This phylogenetic tree was generated from the ligand-binding domains of 1426 putative LGIC genes. Genes were identified by a BLAST search using 210 seed sequences and then refined using Genewise. A thousand bootstrap iterations were performed and branches below 50% bootstrap support were collapsed. Nematode sequences are shown in shades of green, platyhelminthes in yellow, insects in purple and vertebrates in red. C. elegans subunit names are labeled in green. This figure is adapted with permission from Rufener et al. 2010 with changes in the coloring scheme.
